name: Over Civilians
description:
A game mixing strategy and action made in 48 Hours Game Jam - Goethe Institute Beijing.

Being a emperor, you are  controlling your people. But you may never feel how your order really impacts your people. 

As a famer or worker, you have little chance to understand the dilemma of choice-making that your king is suffering. 

In this game, you will first play as the king and then the famer or worker who are controlled by you before. These two parts have mutual influences: when you are being a cruel king, you will experience a harder life as a worker; if you do well as a worker, your king will benefit from it. 

Developers:

  • Programmer: Okami Wong
  • Artist: Yuheng Zhang
